comments:
I've successfully submitted a few jobs today. Using our UI in Cyprus, i could resolve the status of the jobs to: " Job successfully submitted to Globus".


In the Job View though, the status and reason fields remains fixed to "WAITING" and "Submitted from gEclipse" respectively. Refreshing the view, didn't changed the aforementioned fields. 

By closing and opening again the view, the correct reason is then displayed.
I can reprodece the bug. I closed the job view and opened again. First nothing changed. But after a certain time (30 minutes?) the status is changed to UNKNOWN.

I created a simple jsdl file and tried submitting to all of the four listed WMS
servers:
1) The one to wmslb101.grid.ucy.ac.cy showed 'Submitted from g-Eclipse' in the
Status field for a while. I closed the Jobs view and reopened it and the
contents of the Status and Reason fields had changed to 'UNKNOWN' and 'Bug in
gLite 3.0 LB' respectively.
2) The one to wmslb103.grid.ucy.ac.cy showed 'Submitted from g-Eclipse' in the
Status field for a while and then changed automatically to 'SCHEDULED' and 'Job
successfully submitted to Globus' in the Status and Reason fields respectively.
As I write this, the Properties View shows the status as 'DONE'.)
3) The one to iwrrb.fzk.de still shows 'Submitted from g-Eclipse' in the Status
field (I have not closed and reopened the Jobs view.)
4) The one to the OMII resource did not work for me because I am not an
authorized user there.

Here are my results:

1) Successful submission to WMS@wmslb101.grid.ucy.ac.cy
- Immediately:
  JobView - Status: "Submitted from g-Eclipse", Reason: ""
  Properties View - Status: UNKNOWN
- After a few minutes:
  JobView - Unchanged
  Properties View - Unchanged
- After closing and reopening the job view and also after completely resetting the perspective:
  JobView - Unchanged
  Properties View - Unchanged

2) Successful submission to https://iwrrb.fzk.de:7443/glite_wms_wmproxy_server
- Immediately:
  JobView - Status: "Submitted from g-Eclipse", Reason: ""
  Properties View - Status: UNKNOWN
BUT, the properties of the first submitted job changed to:
  JobView - Status: "UNKNOWN", Reason: "Bug in gLite 3.0 LB"
So for me this means that the job viewer is not notified when the job status changes but it queries the status of all jobs when a new job appears. Did you register the job view as a listener to the job status updater?

3) Failed submission to https://omii-eu-03.pd.infn.it:7443/glite_wms_wmproxy_server
  User not authorized
  
4) Failed submission to https://wmslb103.grid.ucy.ac.cy:7443/glite_wms_wmproxy_server
